attributes.action: better screening of content of e-petitions
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to petition for better screening of content of e-petitions.
As an Irish National i was shocked to read an absurd e-petition looking to exclude Irish nationals freedom within the Common Travel Area.
There then followed more obvious anti Irish discrimination.
Despite problems no two countries on the planet are as close as Britain and Ireland.
It is a shame that the people who govern this e-petition site seen fit to include this obvious anti Irish e-petition.
If we do not find a way of controlling the content of e-petitions then its future looks bleak!
